example.parse: ( (CP-Q (IP (ADVP (AD 但是)) (PU ，) (FLR (QP (CD ％)) (NN ｐｗ)) (NP-SBJ (NN 民主党人)) (VP (ADVP (AD 真的)) (VP (VV 可以) (DFL (VV 吹嘘)) (PU ，) (VP (VV 吹嘘) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (NP-PN (NR 维吉尼亚州))) (ADVP (AD 正)) (VP (VV 发生)))) (DEC 的))) (PU ，) (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (NP-PN (NR 新泽西州))) (ADVP (AD 正)) (VP (VV 发生)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 事))))))) (SP 吗) (PU ？)))
